mapper.sql: id, name, code, timeoutRemindFlag, timeout, processConfigId, remindInterval,taskDescription, MTime, CTime
mapper.select:
select id, name, code, timeoutRemindFlag, timeout, processConfigId, remindInterval,taskStartEmailTemplateId,taskDescription,taskEndEmailTemplateId, MTime, CTime ,roleCode,(select code from SYS_EMAIL_TEMPLATE where id = taskStartEmailTemplateId) as taskStartEmailTemplateName ,(select code from SYS_EMAIL_TEMPLATE where id = taskEndEmailTemplateId) as taskEndEmailTemplateName, (select name from SYS_PROCESS_CONFIG where id = processconfigid) as processName from SYS_PROCESS_TASK_CONFIG where 1=1
and name like CONCAT("%",#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")
and processconfigid in(select id from SYS_PROCESS_CONFIG where name like CONCAT("%",#{processname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%") )
and code like CONCAT("%",#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")
limit #{beginIndex,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{numPerPage,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select count(1) from SYS_PROCESS_TASK_CONFIG where 1 = 1
and name like CONCAT("%",#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")
and code like CONCAT("%",#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")
and processconfigid in(select id from SYS_PROCESS_CONFIG where name like CONCAT("%",#{processname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%") )
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_PROCESS_TASK_CONFIG (id, name, code, timeoutRemindFlag, timeout, processConfigId, remindInterval, MTime, CTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeoutremindflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{timeout,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{processconfigid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{remindinterval,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update SYS_PROCESS_TASK_CONFIG
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
timeoutRemindFlag = #{timeoutremindflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
timeout = #{timeout,jdbcType=INTEGER},
processConfigId = #{processconfigid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
remindInterval = #{remindinterval,jdbcType=INTEGER},
taskDescription = #{taskdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
taskStartEmailTemplateId = #{taskstartemailtemplateid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
taskEndEmailTemplateId = #{taskendemailtemplateid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
roleCode = #{rolecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MTime = #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CTime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update SYS_PROCESS_TASK_CONFIG set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, timeoutRemindFlag = #{timeoutremindflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, timeout = #{timeout,jdbcType=INTEGER}, processConfigId = #{processconfigid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, remindInterval = #{remindinterval,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MTime = #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CTime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
